Metadata.title: Home
Metadata.description: Klowhub is a social network for no-code developers

Auth.heroText: Explore, learn, teach, and connect. Create your account on Klowhub and access a world of possibilities.

form.helpPassword: It must contain at least 1 number, 1 uppercase letter, and have a minimum of 6 characters.
form.helpFullName: This will identify you on the platform
form.MailSubscription: I want to receive updates and tips from the platform

fullname.minLength: Full name must be at least 3 characters

username.minLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

password.invalid: Password must be at least 8 characters, no more than 50 characters, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
